prompt: Create a simple VR menu with buttons
completion:
<thinking>
VR menu needs:
1. World-space UI panel
2. Comfortable viewing distance (1.5-2m)
3. @pointable buttons
4. Hover feedback
5. Face the user
</thinking>

```holoscript
composition "VRMenu" {
  
  object menu_panel {
    position: [0, 1.5, -1.8]      // Eye level, comfortable distance
    look_at: "user"               // Face the player
    
    // Background panel
    object background {
      mesh: "plane"
      scale: [0.8, 0.5, 1]
      
      trait Material {
        color: 0x1a1a2e
        opacity: 0.95
        transparent: true
      }
    }
    
    // Title
    object title {
      mesh: "text"
      text: "MAIN MENU"
      font_size: 0.06
      position: [0, 0.18, 0.01]
      
      trait Material {
        color: 0xffffff
      }
    }
    
    // Button template
    template "MenuButton" {
      mesh: "plane"
      scale: [0.3, 0.08, 1]
      
      trait Material {
        color: 0x3344aa
      }
      
      @pointable
      @hoverable
      
      @on_hover_enter {
        self.material.color = 0x5566cc
        self.material.emissive = 0x223366
        audio.play("ui_hover")
      }
      
      @on_hover_exit {
        self.material.color = 0x3344aa
        self.material.emissive = 0x000000
      }
      
      @on_point {
        audio.play("ui_click")
        self.material.color = 0x8899ff
        await delay(100)
        self.material.color = 0x3344aa
      }
    }
    
    // Start Button
    object btn_start using "MenuButton" {
      position: [0, 0.05, 0.01]
      
      object label {
        mesh: "text"
        text: "START GAME"
        font_size: 0.04
        
        trait Material { color: 0xffffff }
      }
      
      @on_point {
        emit("menu_start")
      }
    }
    
    // Settings Button
    object btn_settings using "MenuButton" {
      position: [0, -0.05, 0.01]
      
      object label {
        mesh: "text"
        text: "SETTINGS"
        font_size: 0.04
        
        trait Material { color: 0xffffff }
      }
      
      @on_point {
        emit("menu_settings")
      }
    }
    
    // Quit Button
    object btn_quit using "MenuButton" {
      position: [0, -0.15, 0.01]
      
      object label {
        mesh: "text"
        text: "QUIT"
        font_size: 0.04
        
        trait Material { color: 0xffaaaa }
      }
      
      @on_point {
        emit("menu_quit")
      }
    }
  }
}
```

prompt: Create a treasure chest that opens and spawns loot
completion:
<thinking>
Treasure chest needs:
1. Two-part model (base + lid) or bone animation
2. @pointable for interaction
3. Open animation
4. Loot spawning with physics
5. One-time use (can't re-open)
</thinking>

```holoscript
prefab TreasureChest {
  object chest {
    model: "assets/props/chest.glb"
    
    state {
      isOpen: false
      lootTable: "common_chest"
    }
    
    @pointable
    @hoverable
    
    animation open_lid {
      property: 'bones.lid.rotation.x'
      from: 0
      to: -100
      duration: 600
      easing: 'easeOutBounce'
    }
    
    @on_hover_enter {
      if (!state.isOpen) {
        ui.show_tooltip("Open chest")
        self.material.emissive = 0x222200
      }
    }
    
    @on_hover_exit {
      ui.hide_tooltip()
      self.material.emissive = 0x000000
    }
    
    @on_point {
      if (!state.isOpen) {
        self.open()
      }
    }
    
    action open() async {
      state.isOpen = true
      ui.hide_tooltip()
      
      // Sound and animation
      audio.play_spatial("chest_open", self.position)
      await anim.play("open_lid")
      
      // Spawn particles
      spawn "SparkleVFX" {
        position: self.position + [0, 0.3, 0]
        duration: 2000
      }
      
      // Spawn loot items with physics pop
      await delay(200)
      
      spawn "GoldPile" {
        position: self.position + [0, 0.5, 0]
        physics: "rigid_body"
        velocity: [random(-1, 1), 3, random(-1, 1)]
      }
      
      await delay(100)
      
      spawn "LootItem" {
        position: self.position + [0, 0.5, 0]
        physics: "rigid_body"
        velocity: [random(-1, 1), 4, random(-1, 1)]
        loot_table: state.lootTable
      }
      
      // Jingle sound
      audio.play_spatial("coins_jingle", self.position)
    }
  }
}
```

prompt: Create a working lever that activates machinery
completion:
<thinking>
Lever mechanism needs:
1. Pivot rotation animation
2. @grabbable or @pointable interaction
3. On/off states
4. Event emission for connected objects
5. Visual and audio feedback
</thinking>

```holoscript
prefab Lever {
  object lever_base {
    model: "assets/props/lever_base.glb"
    position: [0, 0, 0]
    isStatic: true
    
    object handle {
      model: "assets/props/lever_handle.glb"
      position: [0, 0.3, 0]       // Pivot point
      
      state {
        isOn: false
        isAnimating: false
        targetId: null              // What this lever controls
      }
      
      @grabbable
      @pointable
      
      animation pull_down {
        property: 'rotation.x'
        from: -30
        to: 30
        duration: 400
        easing: 'easeOutBack'
      }
      
      animation pull_up {
        property: 'rotation.x'
        from: 30
        to: -30
        duration: 400
        easing: 'easeOutBack'
      }
      
      @on_grab {
        if (!state.isAnimating) {
          self.toggle()
        }
      }
      
      @on_point {
        if (!state.isAnimating) {
          self.toggle()
        }
      }
      
      action toggle() async {
        state.isAnimating = true
        
        if (state.isOn) {
          // Turn off
          audio.play_spatial("lever_click", self.position)
          await anim.play("pull_up")
          state.isOn = false
          emit("lever_off", { id: state.targetId })
        } else {
          // Turn on
          audio.play_spatial("lever_clunk", self.position)
          await anim.play("pull_down")
          state.isOn = true
          emit("lever_on", { id: state.targetId })
        }
        
        state.isAnimating = false
      }
    }
  }
}

// Connected machinery example
prefab GearMachine {
  object machine {
    model: "assets/props/gears.glb"
    
    state {
      id: "machine_1"
      isRunning: false
    }
    
    animation spin {
      property: 'rotation.z'
      from: 0
      to: 360
      duration: 2000
      loop: infinite
    }
    
    @on_event("lever_on") {
      if (event.id == state.id) {
        state.isRunning = true
        anim.play("spin")
        audio.play_spatial("machine_start", self.position)
      }
    }
    
    @on_event("lever_off") {
      if (event.id == state.id) {
        state.isRunning = false
        anim.stop("spin")
        audio.play_spatial("machine_stop", self.position)
      }
    }
  }
}
```

prompt: Create a torch that can be grabbed and lights up the area
completion:
<thinking>
Torch needs:
1. @grabbable for carrying
2. Point light attached
3. Flame particle effect
4. Crackling audio
5. Dynamic lighting on/off
</thinking>

```holoscript
prefab Torch {
  object torch {
    model: "assets/props/torch.glb"
    collider: "box"
    physics: "rigid_body"
    mass: 0.5
    
    state {
      isLit: true
    }
    
    @grabbable
    @throwable
    
    // Flame particles
    object flame {
      position: [0, 0.4, 0]       // Top of torch
      
      @visible(parent.state.isLit)
      
      particle_system {
        count: 30
        lifetime: [300, 600]
        
        particle {
          size: [0.02, 0.05]
          color_gradient: [0xffaa00, 0xff4400, 0x220000]
          opacity: [1.0, 0.0]
        }
        
        emission {
          shape: "point"
          rate: 50
          velocity: [0, 1, 0]
          velocity_randomness: 0.3
        }
        
        behavior {
          flicker: true
          flicker_speed: 10
        }
      }
    }
    
    // Dynamic light
    object torch_light {
      type: "point_light"
      position: [0, 0.4, 0]
      
      @visible(parent.state.isLit)
      
      light {
        color: 0xff8833
        intensity: 1.5
        range: 8
        cast_shadows: true
      }
      
      // Flicker effect
      animation flicker {
        property: 'intensity'
        from: 1.3
        to: 1.7
        duration: 150
        loop: infinite
        direction: 'alternate'
        easing: 'linear'
      }
    }
    
    // Crackling sound
    object fire_audio {
      @visible(parent.state.isLit)
      
      audio_source {
        clip: "fire_crackle"
        volume: 0.4
        loop: true
        spatial: true
        range: 5
      }
    }
    
    @on_grab {
      audio.play_spatial("torch_pickup", self.position)
    }
    
    @on_release {
      audio.play_spatial("torch_place", self.position)
    }
    
    // Water extinguishes torch
    @on_trigger_enter(zone) {
      if (zone.tag == "water" && state.isLit) {
        self.extinguish()
      }
    }
    
    action extinguish() {
      state.isLit = false
      audio.play_spatial("fire_extinguish", self.position)
      
      // Steam particles
      spawn "SteamPuff" {
        position: self.position + [0, 0.4, 0]
        duration: 1000
      }
    }
    
    action ignite() {
      if (!state.isLit) {
        state.isLit = true
        audio.play_spatial("fire_ignite", self.position)
      }
    }
  }
}
```

prompt: Create a simple gun that shoots projectiles
completion:
<thinking>
Gun mechanics need:
1. @grabbable for holding
2. Trigger input detection
3. Projectile spawning
4. Muzzle flash VFX
5. Recoil animation
6. Audio
</thinking>

```holoscript
prefab LaserPistol {
  object gun {
    model: "assets/weapons/laser_pistol.glb"
    collider: "box"
    physics: "kinematic"          // Follows hand exactly
    
    state {
      ammo: 10
      maxAmmo: 10
      fireRate: 0.2               // Seconds between shots
      canFire: true
    }
    
    @grabbable
    
    // Muzzle point for spawning projectiles
    object muzzle {
      position: [0, 0.05, 0.15]   // Front of gun
    }
    
    // Muzzle flash
    object flash {
      position: [0, 0.05, 0.15]
      visible: false
      
      particle_system {
        oneshot: true
        count: 10
        lifetime: 100
        
        particle {
          size: 0.1
          color: 0x00ffff
          emissive: 0x00ffff
        }
      }
    }
    
    @on_grab {
      audio.play("gun_equip")
    }
    
    // VR trigger fires weapon
    @on_trigger_press {
      if (state.canFire && state.ammo > 0) {
        self.fire()
      } else if (state.ammo <= 0) {
        audio.play_spatial("gun_empty", self.position)
      }
    }
    
    action fire() async {
      state.canFire = false
      state.ammo = state.ammo - 1
      
      // Spawn projectile
      spawn "LaserBolt" {
        position: self.muzzle.worldPosition
        rotation: self.rotation
        direction: self.forward
      }
      
      // Effects
      self.flash.visible = true
      audio.play_spatial("laser_fire", self.position)
      
      // Recoil
      animation recoil {
        property: 'position.z'
        from: 0
        to: -0.02
        duration: 50
      }
      await anim.play("recoil")
      
      animation recoil_return {
        property: 'position.z'
        from: -0.02
        to: 0
        duration: 100
      }
      anim.play("recoil_return")
      
      // Hide flash
      await delay(50)
      self.flash.visible = false
      
      // Fire rate cooldown
      await delay(state.fireRate * 1000)
      state.canFire = true
    }
    
    action reload() {
      audio.play_spatial("gun_reload", self.position)
      state.ammo = state.maxAmmo
    }
  }
}

// Projectile
prefab LaserBolt {
  object bolt {
    mesh: "cylinder"
    scale: [0.02, 0.02, 0.2]
    
    trait Material {
      color: 0x00ffff
      emissive: 0x00ffff
      emissive_intensity: 2.0
    }
    
    physics: "kinematic"
    collider: "box"
    
    state {
      speed: 50
      damage: 25
      lifetime: 2000
    }
    
    @collidable
    
    @on_mount {
      // Move forward
      self.velocity = self.forward * state.speed
      
      // Auto-despawn
      despawn(self, state.lifetime)
    }
    
    @on_collision(other) {
      if (other.tag != "player" && other.tag != "weapon") {
        // Hit effect
        spawn "ImpactSpark" {
          position: self.position
          duration: 500
        }
        
        audio.play_spatial("laser_impact", self.position)
        
        // Damage if target has health
        if (other.take_damage) {
          other.take_damage(state.damage)
        }
        
        despawn(self)
      }
    }
  }
}
```
